string.name: how_to_play
string.br: 3. When ready to begin, select your deck of choice and click "Start"\n\n
4. Hold phone landscape to your head to begin\n\n
5. Your friends must describe what it says on the screen without using the words themselves\n\n
6. You then must guess what it says on the screen\n\n
7. If you get it right, tilt the phone forward to move on, if you want to skip, tilt the phone back\n\n

br.i: Have fun! Make sure to try and beat your highscore!
